long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you using yarn on your project, you always have to copy paste install command and change "npm i" to "yarn add". This extensions replace text on copy button from "npm i" to "yarn add" at https://npmjs.com and you can just paste it on your terminal without any changes
